import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

sns.set(style='darkgrid')
plt.rcParams["figure.figsize"] = (15,7)
source.28c1f5ae:
df.columns = df.columns.str.lower()

conditions = [
              (df['year'] >= 1928 ) & (df['year'] <= 1945), # Silent Generation
              (df['year'] >= 1945 ) & (df['year'] <= 1964), # Baby Boomers
              (df['year'] >= 1965 ) & (df['year'] <= 1980), #Generation X
              (df['year'] >= 1981 ) & (df['year'] <= 2000), # Generation Y
              (df['year'] >= 2001 ) & (df['year'] <= 2020), # Generation Z
 ]

df['generations'] = np.select(conditions, ["Silent Generation","Baby Boomers",
                                           "Generation X","Generation Y", "Generation Z"], default="Others")

plt.title("Number of births by generations", size=15)
plt.ticklabel_format(style='plain', axis='y')
